# Displaying Tables


```{python}
import plotly.express as px
from itables import show

tips = px.data.tips()
show(tips)

```



# Displaying Plots

```{python}
px.violin(tips, x="tip", y="sex")

```


# Displaying Static Plots


```{python}
tips_sex = px.violin(tips, x="tip", y="sex")
tips_sex.write_image("tips_by_sex.png")

```
